title: 11.59: last minute to choose
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse - Social aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs - Psychological aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse counseling
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Drug abuse - Social aspects
description: A study of the social and psychological factors involved in drug abuse. Various sections of the drug culture are contrasted using split screen techniques. "11:59" brings you into the hospital emergency room, the teenagers are shown in frank discussion groups, exploring attitudes and seeking solutions. WARNING: Contains footage of drug use, overdose and emergency treatment in hospitals.
